page.title: 18A Day at a Middle School.
page.content: A teacher blows the{whistle}at 08.50 for us to go into school.I hang my coat up and go into class for {register.}Our first lesson is{craft which lasts all morning.We either do {clay,painting or drawing.}We have a {fifteen minute break}at 10.20 and I play football.The bell goes at 11.45 for dinner. For{dinner}there is a{good {choice.}I have{fish,chips,mushy peas {and parsley sauce.}For{pudding}I have {apple crumble and custard.}Then out to play football again.Next is register at 13.10,then onto{maths}for a double lesson.Break is at 14.25.{Religous {education}is next followed by {French.}At 15.40 I go to the classroom and check{homework}to be done.The final bell rings at 15.45 and home I go.
